name: Immunization Game
description:
The world is facing a dangerous virus. Your mission is to collect coins in order to make the funding for vaccines available. Be aware of the Covid-19 virus. Each level you complete you are closer to immunization. 

How to play: 

  • Use the right and left arrows to walk; 
  • Press shift, while walking, to run; 
  • Click the spacebar to jump, click it twice to double jump; 
  • Click the F button to fire.
